title: Trading Signed Caramel for Signed Tobacco

posts.post_title: Trading Signed Caramel for Signed Tobacco
posts.post_content:
Considering trading these two unbelievably scarce beauties for their more common signed T206 brethren.  Let me know if you'd like to upgrade -- [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]
